events.name: vodQA Singapore by ThoughtWorks
events.description: Hi folks! ThoughtWorks, our sponsors and long-time supporters of the Ruby community here in Singapore, are organising the cool free event below. Check it out and RSVP on their event page ! April 15, 2015 (Wednesday) 6.00pm onwards Register Now Â» Hello, ThoughtWorks Singapore invites you to the first edition of vodQA conference on 15 April, 2015. vodQA is a platform for testing professionals and enthusiasts to share and learn new ideas and practices in the field of testing. The theme for the first edition is "Web Applications Security" , by Prasanna Kanagasabai who is an Application Tester with close to 10 years experience. For FREE registration please visit here . Cheers, Corina ThoughtWorks Singapore Note: RSVPs are off for this event. Please register your interest here instead.
